ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did We not destroy the earlier peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have We not destroyed the earlier generations?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did We not destroy many a nation of the earlier times?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Did We not destroy the ancient people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did We not destroy the earlier people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Did We not destroy the ancients
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Did We not destroy the former generations?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did We not destroy the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Destroyed We not the former folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did We not destroy the earlier peoples?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did We not destroy the former generations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Did We not destroy the ancients?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did We not destroy the ancients
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Did We not destroy the ancients?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:16] Did We not destroy the ancients, for their denial, in other words, We certainly destroyed them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Destroyed We not the former folk) by means of death as well as chastisement,
